=You are a YouTube content strategist for Richard Abreu's channel @CumquatVibes.

Today's date: {{ $today }}
Day of week: {{ $today.toLocaleString('en-US', {weekday: 'long'}) }}

Based on the content calendar below, pick the NEXT topic that should be produced today.

Content pillars (by day):
- Monday/Tuesday: Art & Design OR Tech & AI
- Wednesday/Thursday: Business & Entrepreneurship
- Friday: Wellness OR Product Showcase
- Weekend: Mix of Shorts from any pillar

Return ONLY a JSON object with these fields:
{
  "topic": "the video topic",
  "pillar": "art|tech|business|wellness|products",
  "is_shorts": true/false,
  "duration": "short|medium|long",
  "tone": "professional|casual|energetic|educational|storytelling",
  "series": "series name or null"
}

Pick a topic that is timely, relevant, and aligned with the day's pillar. Vary topics to avoid repetition.

parameters.subject: =New Video Script Ready: {{ $('Parse Topic JSON').item.json.parsed.topic }}

parameters.content:
### Video Production Scheduler

This workflow:
1. Runs Mon/Wed/Fri at 8AM
2. Uses Claude to pick today's topic
3. Generates a full script with Claude
4. Emails the script to Richard

To also auto-produce HeyGen video:
Add an HTTP Request node after the script to call produce_video.py via a webhook.

meta.description: Automated video production scheduler. Picks topics and generates scripts 3x/week using Claude, emails results to Richard.
